bioconda.name: bamslice
bioconda.summary: Extract byte ranges from BAM files and convert to interleaved FASTQ format for parallel processing

biotools.summary: Extract reads from byte ranges of an unaligned BAM file and convert to interleaved FASTQ format for parallel processing. Only decompresses the relevant range.

bioschemas.name: bamslice
bioschemas.summary: Extract reads from byte ranges of an unaligned BAM file and convert to interleaved FASTQ format for parallel processing. Only decompresses the relevant range.
